text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Trump: "If COVID-19 testing stops — the US won’t have coronavirus cases anymore"

Yes..trump is really this dumb, this dude is either a moron or he suffers from dementia. Dr. Fauci is hiding in a closet right now out of embarrassment.
